mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mary Frances Switzer Papers
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Papers, letters, and photographs of Mary Frances Switzer (1919-2005) of Florida, who served as a World War II army nurse in France, Belgium, and Germany. The collection comprises letters written during the war by Mary to her parents; letters from friends and relatives, the bulk of which comes from Mary's fiance, Allen Galer; official military documents about Mary's assignments; ephemera from locations visited in Europe; and earlier letters exchanged among family members.
